languages.text: {n}Странный осколок уже был здесь со дня вашего взошествия на трон Вольного Торговца. Присмотревшись получше, вы ловите себя на странной мысли: пускай изуродованный и изъеденный неведомой вам силой, он отдаленно напоминает призрачную кость — материал, созданный эльдарами.{/n}

{n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Странный осколок уже был здесь со дня вашего взошествия на трон Вольного Торговца. Присмотревшись получше, вы ловите себя на странной мысли: пускай изуродованный и изъеденный неведомой вам силой, он отдаленно напоминает призрачную кость — материал, созданный эльдарами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The strange shard has been here ever since the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by an unknown power, but it does resemble a wraithbone — the Aeldari-made material.{/n}

{n}The strange shard has been here ever since the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by an unknown power, but it does resemble a wraithbone — the Aeldari-made material.{/n}

{n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

{n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

{n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个奇怪的碎片在你继任行商浪人的职位之前就挂在那里了。经过仔细观察之后，你脑中产生了古怪的猜测，尽管这件造物曾遭受过某种未知力量的破坏与腐蚀，但依稀可以看得出来，这似乎是艾达灵族制作的灵骨。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个奇怪的碎片在你继任行商浪人的职位之前就挂在那里了。经过仔细观察之后，你脑中产生了古怪的猜测，尽管这件造物曾遭受过某种未知力量的破坏与腐蚀，但依稀可以看得出来，这似乎是艾达灵族制作的灵骨。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El extraño fragmento lleva aquí por lo menos desde el día en que asumiste el trono como Comerciante Independiente. Al examinarlo más de cerca, una idea extraña te ronda la mente: aunque desfigurado y corroído por una fuerza desconocida, sí que guarda una cierta semejanza con el hueso espectral, un material forjado por los Aeldari.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El extraño fragmento lleva aquí por lo menos desde el día en que asumiste el trono como Comerciante Independiente. Al examinarlo más de cerca, una idea extraña te ronda la mente: aunque desfigurado y corroído por una fuerza desconocida, sí que guarda una cierta semejanza con el hueso espectral, un material forjado por los Aeldari.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cet étrange fragment était déjà là le jour où vous êtes {mf|devenu le nouveau libre-marchand|devenue la nouvelle libre-marchande}. Quand vous l'observez de plus près, une étrange pensée vous traverse l'esprit : une corrosion mystérieuse l'a rendu méconnaissable, mais il s'agit peut-être de moelle spectrale, un matériau conçu par les Aeldaris.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cet étrange fragment était déjà là le jour où vous êtes {mf|devenu le nouveau libre-marchand|devenue la nouvelle libre-marchande}. Quand vous l'observez de plus près, une étrange pensée vous traverse l'esprit : une corrosion mystérieuse l'a rendu méconnaissable, mais il s'agit peut-être de moelle spectrale, un matériau conçu par les Aeldaris.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der seltsame Splitter hängt hier schon mindestens seit dem Tag deiner Besteigung des Freihändlerthrons. Bei näherem Hinsehen kommt dir ein merkwürdiger Gedanke: Er mag von einer unbekannten Kraft verformt und korrodiert worden sein, erinnert aber entfernt an Phantomkristall, ein Material, das von den Aeldari hergestellt wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der seltsame Splitter hängt hier schon mindestens seit dem Tag deiner Besteigung des Freihändlerthrons. Bei näherem Hinsehen kommt dir ein merkwürdiger Gedanke: Er mag von eine unbekannten Kraft verformt und korrodiert worden sein, erinnert aber entfernt an Phantomkristall, ein Material, das von den Aeldari hergestellt wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その奇妙な破片は、少なくともあなたが自由開拓者の王座に就いた日からここにあったものだ。よく見ていると、奇妙な考えが頭をよぎる。未知の力によって変形し、腐食しているのだろうが、どことなくアエルダリが作った幽骨に似ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その奇妙な破片は、少なくともあなたが自由開拓者の王座に就いた日からここにあったものだ。よく見ていると、奇妙な考えが頭をよぎる。未知の力によって変形し、腐食しているのだろうが、どことなくアエルダリが作った幽骨に似ている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu tuhaf parça, sen Hür Tacir tahtına oturmadan önceden beri orada. Yakından baktığında ilginç bir fikir aklına geliyor, bilinmeyen bir güç tarafından bozulmuş veya aşındırılmış olabileceğini düşünüyorsun. Aeldari elinden çıkma bir materyal olan tayfkemiği andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Looking closely, an odd thought nags at your mind: it may be disfigured and corroded by some unknown power, but it vaguely resembles wraithbone, a material crafted by the Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu tuhaf parça, en azından sen Hür Tacir tahtına oturduğun günden beri orada. Yakından baktığında ilginç bir fikir aklına geliyor: Bilinmeyen bir güç tarafından bozulmuş veya aşındırılmış olabilir ama Aeldariler tarafından yapılan bir materyal olan tayfkemiği andırıyor.{/n}
